description: Explore the prevalent scams in the NFT space and learn how to protect yourself from falling victim to fraudulent schemes. This guide offers insights into common NFT scams such as phishing, counterfeit, and pump-and-dump schemes, and provides safety tips for navigating the digital asset market.
keywords: NFT scams, digital art, blockchain, non-fungible tokens, NFT protection, phishing scams, counterfeit NFTs, pump and dump, rug pull, bidding scams, NFT security
title: Navigating the Murky Waters of NFT Scams
